thread.section_title: Big drama ahead for Steven Beale as Aaron Sidwell signs new EastEnders contract – Metro
thread.title: Big drama ahead for Steven Beale as Aaron Sidwell signs new EastEnders contract
thread.title_full: Big drama ahead for Steven Beale as Aaron Sidwell signs new EastEnders contract

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Big drama ahead for Steven Beale as Aaron Sidwell signs new EastEnders contract
text:
(Picture: BBC) There’s at least another year of drama ahead for Steven Beale in EastEnders as actor Aaron Sidwell has reportedly signed on the dotted line to stick around in Walford – but there could be big drama ahead as Lauren Branning continues to toy with the idea of cheating with her boyfriend. 
Steven shocked his family by returning last year but quickly proved that he had changed by building bridges with his family and relationships are now restored – fans will even see Steven happily playing boardgames with Ian and Jane tonight! How times have changed…
At the moment, viewers know that Lauren is bored in her relationship with Steven and is currently tempted by the interest of Max’s colleague, Josh – aka photocopier guy. If Lauren were to cheat, might the heartbreak make Steven’s dark side rear its head again?
(Picture: BBC) As EastEnders don’t comment on the contracts of cast, there is no indication on what direction Steven’s character will take over the next year but fans of Steven and Aaron will no doubt be delighted that he isn’t set to go anywhere in the near future.
MORE: EastEnders star Danny-Boy Hatchard offers to drive to meet nine-year-old fan battling cancer 
MORE: EastEnders spoilers: Denise Fox’s storyline leads to another surprise character return
